title: full effect to Commission Implementing Regulation (EU) 2024/1975 of 19 July
heading: 1. These Regulations may be cited as the European Union (Marine
text_raw:
1. These Regulations may be cited as the European Union (Marine 

Equipment) (Amendment) Regulations 2024.
text_norm: 1 regulation may cited european union (marine equipment) (amendment) regulation 2024

title: full effect to Commission Implementing Regulation (EU) 2024/1975 of 19 July
heading: 2. Regulation 10 of the European Union (Marine Equipment) Regulations
text_raw:
2. Regulation 10 of the European Union (Marine Equipment) Regulations 
2017 (S.I. No. 177 of 2017) is amended, in paragraph (2), by substituting for 
subparagraph (b) the following: 

“(b) have the conformity assessment carried out, through a notified body, using 
one of the procedures referred to in Article 15(2)(a) or (b) of the Directive and 
the modules for conformity assessment set out in the Annex to Commission 
Implementing Regulation (EU) 2024/1975 of 19 July 20243,”.
text_norm: 2 regulation 10 european union (marine equipment) regulation 2017 (s.i no 177 2017) amended paragraph (2) substituting subparagraph (b) following (b) conformity assessment carried notified body using one procedure referred article 15(2)(a) (b) directive module conformity assessment set annex commission implementing regulation (eu) 2024 1975 19 july 20243

title: full effect to Commission Implementing Regulation (EU) 2024/1975 of 19 July
heading: 3. Regulation 4 of the European Union (Marine Equipment) (Amendment)
text_raw:
3. Regulation 4 of the European Union (Marine Equipment) (Amendment) 

Regulations 2023 (S.I. No. 560 of 2023) is revoked. 

GIVEN under the Official Seal of the Minister for 
Transport, 

29 October, 2024. 

EAMON RYAN, 

Minister for Transport.

title: full effect to Commission Implementing Regulation (EU) 2024/1975 of 19 July
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

These Regulations amend the European Union (Marine Equipment) Regulations 
2017 (S.I. No. 177 of 2017), which gave effect to Directive 2014/90/EU on 
marine equipment. 

The Regulations take account of Commission Implementing Regulation (EU) 
2024/1975, which applies the annual updated list of marine equipment and 
testing standards that falls under the scope of Directive 2014/90/EU. 

The Regulations revoke the previous annual update made by Regulation 4 of the 
European Union (Marine Equipment) (Amendment) Regulations 2023 (S.I. No. 
560 of 2023). 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [580]
